tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_risks (
  risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_description TEXT,
  mitigation_strategy TEXT,
  risk_owner TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risks (
    risk_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    risk_category TEXT NOT NULL,
    risk_likelihood INT NOT NULL,
    risk_impact INT NOT NULL,
    risk_status TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_strategies (
    strategy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_id INT REFERENCES risks(risk_id),
    strategy_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    strategy_owner TEXT NOT NULL,
    strategy_status TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Risk (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	likelihood VARCHAR(50),
	impact VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Owner (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	risk_id INT NOT NULL,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	role VARCHAR(50),
	contact VARCHAR(100),
	FOREIGN KEY (risk_id) REFERENCES Risk(id)
);
CREATE TABLE project (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, project_description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
